title: WATCH | Where to travel based on your Zodiac sign
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Don't know where to go to next? Let your Zodiac sign decide for you!

The locations featured are based on the compatibility of destinations with one of the 12 Zodiac signs.

Even Joburg got a mention as the perfect destination for the brooding Scorpio because of the city's passion and resilience.

Whether you're a spiritual Sagittarius or a diplomatic Libra, let the stars chart the course for your next adventure.

READ: Gaze at the skies with these astronomy events for 2019





Find Your Escape by signing up for the Traveller24 Weekly Newsletter – Subscribe here. Or download the News24 App here, to receive expertly curated travel ideas and deals directly to your mobile.
description: Johannesburg is the perfect spot for Scorpios.
